tool.name: methylKit
tool.description: Runs differential analysis of methylation between two genome-wide methylation profiles
tool.command:
methylkit_wrapper.py
## DIRECTORIES
--tool_dir "$__tool_directory__"
## PROFILE A
--name_A "$profile_A.name_A"
#set files_A = '"\;--infile--\:"'.join( [ str( $file ) for $file in $profile_A.cytosine_report_A ] ) --files_A "${files_A}"
## PROFILE B
--name_B "$profile_B.name_B"
#set files_B = '"\;--infile--\:"'.join( [ str( $file ) for $file in $profile_B.cytosine_report_B ] ) --files_B "${files_B}"
## SETTINGS
--n_threads $settings.n_threads --chr_len "${settings.built_in_igv_genomes_chr_sizes.fields.path}" --win $settings.window --min_cov $settings.min_cov --max_cov $settings.max_cov --qvalue $settings.qvalue #if $settings.pool --pool #end if
--analysis_type $analysis_type.analysis_type_selector #if str ( $analysis_type.analysis_type_selector ) == "context_dependent" --diff_CG $analysis_type.diff_CG --diff_CHG $analysis_type.diff_CHG --diff_CHH $analysis_type.diff_CHH #else if str ( $analysis_type.analysis_type_selector ) == "context_independent" --diff_C $analysis_type.diff_C #else --diff_C $analysis_type.diff_C --diff_CG $analysis_type.diff_CG --diff_CHG $analysis_type.diff_CHG --diff_CHH $analysis_type.diff_CHH #end if
## OUTPUTS
#if $output.windows_report #if str ( $analysis_type.analysis_type_selector ) == "context_dependent" --win_report_CG $windows_report_CG --win_report_CHG $windows_report_CHG --win_report_CHH $windows_report_CHH #else if str ( $analysis_type.analysis_type_selector ) == "context_independent" --win_report_C $windows_report_C #else --win_report_C $windows_report_C --win_report_CG $windows_report_CG --win_report_CHG $windows_report_CHG --win_report_CHH $windows_report_CHH #end if #end if
#if $output.plot_diff or $output.plot_coverage or $output.plot_correlation or $output.plot_pca --plot $plots #if $output.plot_diff --plot_diff #end if #if $output.plot_meth --plot_meth #end if #if $output.plot_coverage --plot_cov #end if #if $output.plot_correlation --plot_cor #end if #if $output.plot_pca --plot_pca #end if #end if
#if $output.cmd_report --cmd_report $cmd_report #end if #if $output.log_report --log_report $log_report #end if

param.label: Difference of cytosines methylation percentage in CHG context required to retain a genomic window

section.name: output
section.title: Choose the output files to be returned

param.name: windows_report

param.help: Display for each genomic window in each context: (i) the methylation difference in percentage between the two profiles with the according significance indicators, (ii) the coverage, the count of methylated C and unmethylated C of each sample

param.label: Plot distribution of cytosine coverage?

param.name: plot_meth

param.name: plot_correlation
param.label: Plot pairwise correlation between methylation profiles of the sample?

param.name: plot_pca
param.label: Plot PCA between replicates within a profile?

param.name: plot_diff
param.label: Plot Distribution of Methylation Differences?

param.label: Generate a log report?

data.name: windows_report_C
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: Windows Exhaustive Report (all C)
data.filter: output['windows_report'] is True and ( analysis_type['analysis_type_selector'] == 'context_independent' or analysis_type['analysis_type_selector'] == 'both' )

data.name: windows_report_CG
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: Windows Exhaustive Report (CG)
data.filter: output['windows_report'] is True and ( analysis_type['analysis_type_selector'] == 'context_dependent' or analysis_type['analysis_type_selector'] == 'both' )

data.name: windows_report_CHG
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: Windows Exhaustive Report (CHG)
data.filter: output['windows_report'] is True and ( analysis_type['analysis_type_selector'] == 'context_dependent' or analysis_type['analysis_type_selector'] == 'both' )

data.name: windows_report_CHH
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: Windows Exhaustive Report (CHH)
data.filter: output['windows_report'] is True and ( analysis_type['analysis_type_selector'] == 'context_dependent' or analysis_type['analysis_type_selector'] == 'both' )

data.name: plots
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: Plots
data.filter: output['plot_diff'] is True or output['plot_coverage'] is True or output['plot_correlation'] is True or output['plot_pca'] is True

tool.help:
**What it does**
| This tool takes as inputs two genome-wide cytosine methylation profiles and performs pairwise comparisons to reveal the differences of methylation between the two profiles. To proceed, methylKit scans the reference genome by windows of N bp (100 bp by default) and compares the methylation status of the two profiles for each window. | | Each of the two profiles is defined by one or several genome-wide cytosine methylation reports, given as output by the tool **Bismark Meth. Extractor**
